title: AntKB
author: AntKB
content: URGENT Business Loan RequiredDEADLINE: To receive funds BY 10.00AM MONDAY, 17TH APRIL, 2023 (Tomorrow)!Amount: £3,000.00Investor Repaid: £12,000.00.Time Investor Paid: 30 working days.Payment: £3,000.00 into my Business Bank Account. Overview:I signed a contract. My task is to supply my Health and Wellness self made goods to a Company. Starting Fee:It's stipulated in the contract I signed that I must bear an equal share of the Contract Service Fee. My share is £727.50. After which I start receiving the Payments due to me below; an advance payment of £50,000.00 to supply my goods to the buyer.The Contract:£500,000.00 is to be paid to me. Two payments are scheduled:£50,000.00 and £500,000.00 (both minus 3% discount)Total: £500,000.00 (minus 3% discount)Security:My Bank is in the United Kingdom. My Business Manager, reviewed my Signed Contract and relevant Contract documents and then after one to two days elapsed, I received an email, thanking me for my Contract documentation and also congratulating me on opening my Business Bank Account. Therefore, my bank has approved it.NEXT STEPS:Sign a NDA to review Contract, etc. PLEASE HURRY IF YOU ARE AN INVESTOR.I have attached an image of my Contract. It's obscured some information. Privacy reasons. Thank you.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: AntKB on April 16, 2023, 01:07:43 PMAmount: £3,000.00Investor Repaid: £12,000.00.Time Investor Paid: 30 working days.So after failing to sell your expert horse racing prediction method that could make you a millionaire, your hundred of million worth of copyrights for books that will sell into billions you're down to not having $1000 to seal the deal on another marvelous half a million contract?Derek Fox was 8:1 at the Grand National with your bulletproof method you only need some £150 and you wouldn't be right now asking for a loan.Plus I love the 300% interest paid back in 30 months, sounds so tempting!

comments.author: AntKB
comments.created_time: April 16, 2023, 02:22:21 PMLast edit: April 18, 2023, 02:27:47 AM by Mr. Big
comments.body: I have no liquid cash at the moment until this Tuesday coming. Otherwise I would not post here. I have plans for next week to raise some funds but by then if will be too late. My deadline Monday coming. Therefore, I'm looking for a loan. It's all gone through my bank. I've been with them since 2003.I have the emails and contract etc waiting but I must send you an NDA to sign because my Buyer asked me too keep it private as much as possible. Do you have an receiving DM message box?Thank I would be willing to offer my book if you offered £25,000.00. Part payment:£1,000.00 via PayPal. So that I could transfer funds to my business bank account without delays or technical difficulties. £24,000.00 via Bitcoin.Thank you for considering.Regards,Quote from: stompix on April 16, 2023, 01:53:13 PMQuote from: AntKB on April 16, 2023, 01:07:43 PMAmount: £3,000.00Investor Repaid: £12,000.00.Time Investor Paid: 30 working days.So after failing to sell your expert horse racing prediction method that could make you a millionaire, your hundred of million worth of copyrights for books that will sell into billions you're down to not having $1000 to seal the deal on another marvelous half a million contract?Derek Fox was 8:1 at the Grand National with your bulletproof method you only need some £150 and you wouldn't be right now asking for a loan.Plus I love the 300% interest paid back in 30 months, sounds so tempting!

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Noone is going to loan you a penny without valid collateral. You also are posting this in the wrong section. Research the forum a bit before blindly posting.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.created_time: April 17, 2023, 11:58:21 PMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 11:15:32 PM by Timelord2067
comments.body: AntKB Date Registered:    2018-11-04, 02:59:07capecape33 Date Registered:    2018-11-14, 00:00:11Both woke up within two days of each-otherAntKB https://bpip.org/Profile?id=2460526capecape33 https://bpip.org/Profile?id=2471806Both have asked for loans of multiple thousands here:Quote from: capecape33 on March 27, 2023, 07:23:49 PMI made a website and I make ads arbitrage, if you don't know what that is google it to find more about it.In short I buy ads from certain sites and direct the traffic to my site and earn money from adsense(it's harder than it sound).I need to borrow between 5000-10000$ to scale up, not necessarily from one person it can be from more than just one, minimum 2000$ per person.My ROI is 90-160% every two months, tested in the last 6 months.I offer 50% after two months.I am not trying to scam anybody so I will NOT request you to send the money trough friends and family,the payment can be sent normally via a paypal.me link which is covered by paypal buyer protection.You can chargeback the money after two months if you think I will not pay.Rules:-No, I will not send you all the money using crypto or other payment method after two months, I don't want to get scammed( sending you money trough another payment method and you charging back the paypal, leaving me on minus);-After two months, I will refund your paypal payment trough paypal and send extra 50% trough paypal or other method if you want(crypto), but ONLY THE PROFIT with other method.Quote from: AntKB on April 16, 2023, 01:07:43 PMURGENT Business Loan RequiredDEADLINE: To receive funds BY 10.00AM MONDAY, 17TH APRIL, 2023 (Tomorrow)!Amount: £3,000.00Investor Repaid: £12,000.00.Time Investor Paid: 30 working days.Payment: £3,000.00 into my Business Bank Account. Overview:I signed a contract. My task is to supply my Health and Wellness self made goods to a Company. Starting Fee:It's stipulated in the contract I signed that I must bear an equal share of the Contract Service Fee. My share is £727.50. After which I start receiving the Payments due to me below; an advance payment of £50,000.00 to supply my goods to the buyer.The Contract:£500,000.00 is to be paid to me. Two payments are scheduled:£50,000.00 and £500,000.00 (both minus 3% discount)Total: £500,000.00 (minus 3% discount)Security:My Bank is in the United Kingdom. My Business Manager, reviewed my Signed Contract and relevant Contract documents and then after one to two days elapsed, I received an email, thanking me for my Contract documentation and also congratulating me on opening my Business Bank Account. Therefore, my bank has approved it.NEXT STEPS:Sign a NDA to review Contract, etc. PLEASE HURRY IF YOU ARE AN INVESTOR.I have attached an image of my Contract. It's obscured some information. Privacy reasons. Thank you.Coincidence?  I think not.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on April 17, 2023, 11:58:21 PMCoincidence?  I think not.I think your thinking is perfect. The user already deleted posts and also edited a few posts to non-readable words. I think the user thought that is finally done and could not think it can be stored elsewhere. All the posts are on https://ninjastic.space/search?author=capecape33

comments.author: arabspaceship123
comments.body: It's ambitious to ask for loans without collateral. You'll be disappointed you created the account for nothing.Quote from: AntKB on April 16, 2023, 01:07:43 PMURGENT Business Loan Required
